events.description: VALENCIA - Head of Spanish Eastern region of Valencia Carlos Mazon appears before the regional assembly on deadly floods. More than 200 people died after heavy rains on Oct 29 caused waterways to overflow, creating flash floods that surged through suburbs south of the city of Valencia, sweeping away cars and bridges and flooding properties and underground car parks.SCHEDULE:1030GMT - Carlos Mazon appears before the regional assembly
events.headline: EUROPE-WEATHER/SPAIN-MAZON
